data.text:
@ScottishGroup But masks in Scottish pubs until the end of the month..

Can you remind me when masks were dispensed of in England..

I'm pretty sure it was 80f in England at that time..

Is @NicolaSturgeon waiting for 80f in Scotland..?
@ScottishGroup I will not be going in to any venues continuing the utter nonsense.
@ScottishGroup And what a waste of time it was and businesses loosing customers/ money up and down Scotland, thanks to Sturgeon & Swinney!
@ScottishGroup Agreed but if any business continues with them rightly deserves to go under through mass boycotts
